description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Bumblicity: It's a frantic head-to-head word game!  Utilizing an army of bees, you must drop the letter tiles to spell words, chain combos and get as many points as you can!  Play against a friend or any of the CPU's 4 difficulty levels.  Think fast and you'll never be at a loss for words!
description.short: Bumblicity: It's a frantic head-to-head word game!  Utilizing an army of bees, you must drop the letter tiles to spell words, chain combos and get as many points as you can!  Play against a friend or any of the CPU's 4 difficulty levels.  Think fast and you'll never be at a loss for words!
